title: Ticket #4213: Improve DAG final node documentation
description: There should at least be a note that the final node is run if the DAG is condor_rm'ed; I sort of recall that if you condor_rm it a second time it will kill the final node, but I'm not sure about that. Anyhow, I need to look at the code and clarify things.
check_ins: 2014-May-20 12:15   Check-in [40185]: add note to documentation on DAGMan FINAL node #4213 (By Karen Miller )
